channel.title: C++ on Fei Hua
channel.description: Recent content in C++ on Fei Hua

item.title: Optimized surface code
item.description: In this paper, we utilizing the high-province error correction surface code and simulate the real quantum circuit in surface code. Our goal is to schedule the braiding operations by using IBM qiskit to generate the critical path for any given circuit using Zulehnerâ€™s QASM Mapping to generate the DAG. And based on braiding constraint to find the perfect scheduling for surface code. Compared to the critical path, we find our schedule can very close to the critical path.

item.title: Parallel Batched Heap on GPU
item.description: In this paper, we implement Parallel Batch Heap implement on GPU based on some very practical benchmark(like knapsacks,dijkstra). the most challenging part is that Thread safely on Bottom-up and Top-down insertion/deletions, and optimization with early stops Unlike the previous work, we can perfectly deal with the partial batch by utilizing a partial buffer.
